fulltext:
VINH-TRUNG LUU 
  Working in Big Data and open to job opportunities in Data Analytics.  
 12 years’ experience concentrated in Software Engineering and Data Mining.  
 3 first-author publications, 1 first-author in accepted manuscript during Ph.D  
 and Postdoc.  
 Email: luuvinhtrung79@gmail.com, LinkedIn, Github Phone: (33)753 420091 
                                                                                                                         (84)913 341642 
Experience 
10/2018 – present: FPT Software, Data Analyst in Foundry Big Data Platform by Palantir for Airbus 
Skywise project, onsite 3 months in Toulouse, France   
05/2017-08/2018: Telecom-Paristech Institution, Postdoc in Geolytics project for Traffic flow congestion 
prediction 
12/2013-12/2016: Haute-Alsace University, PhD in Web usage mining  
1/2011-12/2013: HCM OU uni., CS researcher and lecturer of Software Project Management 
06/2009-12/2010: Splendid Tech., Java senior developer 
11/2006-12/2007: Clearpath Development, Java developer 
09/2005-11/2006: HPT Software Center, PHP&MySQL developer  
Technical Skills 
Programming Languages: Python, Java, PHP, Latex 
Concept: Object-oriented programming 
Database Management System: MySQL, Microsoft SQL Server, Postgres SQL, Post GIS 
Machine Learning & Statistical Techniques: Regression, Regularization, Clustering, Ensemble, 
Sequence Alignment algorithms 
Operating Systems: Microsoft Windows, Fedora 
IDE: PyCharm, Jupyter, Eclipse 
Source Controls: SVN, Git 
Platform: J2EE, Data ETL 
Framework: Spark, Hibernate 
Methodologies: Scrum/Agile, Waterfall 
Project Management tools: VersionOne, Microsoft Project, Microsoft Excel 
Data Visualization tool: Tableau, Microsoft Excel, R 
Others: Open Street Map, Urban Traffic, IBM RFID Middleware, Aviation, Slack, etc. 
Education 
Ph.D degree: 12/2016, MIPS-ENSISA, Haute-Alsace uni., in Computer Science 
Master degree: 12/2009, Bordeaux 1 uni. (PUF-HCM), in Software Engineering 
Bachelor degree: 12/2005, HCM Natural Science uni., in Information Technology 
Other relevant qualifications 
AOTS software design and development completing certificate (scholarship 1/2006)  
Research interests  
Machine Learning, Big Data, Statistical Learning, Clustering, Web Usage Behavior, Sequence Alignment 
Publication 
1. Vinh-Trung Luu, Germain Forestier, Mathis Ripken, Frédéric Fondement, Pierre-Alain Muller: 
Web usage prediction and recommendation using web session clustering. In Digital 
Information Management (ICDIM), 2016 Eleventh International Conference, pp. 107-113. 
IEEE, 2016. 
2. Vinh-Trung Luu, Mathis Ripken, Germain Forestier, Frédéric Fondement, Pierre-Alain Muller: 
Using Glocal Event Alignment for Comparing Sequences of Significantly Different Lengths. 
In Machine Learning and Data Mining in Pattern Recognition, pp. 58-72. Springer International 
Publishing, 2016. 
3. Vinh-Trung  Luu, Germain Forestier, Frédéric Fondement, Pierre-Alain Muller:  
Web Site Audience Segmentation Using Hybrid Alignment Techniques. In Trends and 
Applications in Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining, pp. 29-40. Springer International 
Publishing, 2015. 
Accepted 
4. Vinh-Trung Luu, Mathis Ripken, Germain Forestier, Frédéric Fondement, Pierre-Alain Muller: 
A review of alignment-based similarity measures for web usage mining (Artificial Intelligence 
Review - Springer). 
Referees 
Pierre-Alain Muller, Thesis director (pierre-alain.muller@uha.fr)  
Stephan Clemencon, Postdoc supervisor  
(stephan.clemencon@telecom-paristech.fr) 
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)
